scripts.dev:suite: concurrently -n nest,next -c blue,green "cd ../../backend/multi-agent-app && PORT=3001 npm run start:dev" "NEXT_PUBLIC_USE_MOCK=false NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=http://localhost:3001 next dev"
scripts.dev:suite:full: dotenv -e ../../.env -- concurrently -n agent,nest,next -c magenta,blue,green "(cd ../../agent_backend && ./venv/bin/uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0)" "cd ../../backend/multi-agent-app && PORT=3001 npm run start:dev" "NEXT_PUBLIC_USE_MOCK=false NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=http://localhost:3001 next dev"
